long_description: Look elegant yet casual at the same time. How? In the women's denim, trim-fitting Royal Robbins Cruiser Blazer. Cruiser denim is made from a blend of cotton and polyester that's lighter in weight and dries faster than conventional denim. Fabric offers stretch, moisture management and long-lasting durability; also offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Front logo-button closure; dropped back hem. Zippered drop-in pocket in front holds a cellphone. Royal Robbins Cruiser Blazer features reflective trim in the back to increase visibility. Sleeve cuffs show a slight bell shape.
short_description: Look elegant yet casual at the same time. How? In the women's denim, trim-fitting Royal Robbins Cruiser Blazer.
